en.label: Mystaran Calendar (Karameikan Calendar)
en.description: The calendar system used in the D&D Mystara campaign setting and the Known World from the BECMI era. Features twelve 28-day months with seven-day weeks, following the Thyatian dating system.

months.name: Nuwmont
months.description: First month of winter. The new year begins with celebrations and the winter cold holds the land in its grip.

months.name: Vatermont
months.description: Second month of winter. The rainy season begins in early Vatermont, bringing moisture that prepares the land for spring.

months.name: Thaumont
months.description: First month of spring. The rainy season continues through late Thaumont as winter gives way to warmer weather.

months.name: Flaurmont
months.description: Second month of spring. The land comes alive with flowers and new growth as the weather warms.

months.name: Yarthmont
months.description: Third month of spring. Late spring brings pleasant weather and preparation for the coming summer heat.

months.name: Klarmont
months.description: First month of summer. The first day of Klarmont marks the official beginning of summer with celebrations.

months.name: Felmont
months.description: Second month of summer. Mid-summer brings warmth tempered by ocean breezes and mountain barriers.

months.name: Fyrmont
months.description: Third month of summer. Late summer continues with mild weather due to the region's favorable geography.

months.name: Ambyrmont
months.description: First month of autumn. The first day of Ambyrmont marks the official beginning of autumn and harvest season.

months.name: Sviftmont
months.description: Second month of autumn. The 28th of Sviftmont celebrates the King's Birthday with festivities throughout the realm.

months.name: Eirmont
months.description: Third month of autumn. Late autumn brings cooler weather as winter approaches.

months.name: Kaldmont
months.description: First month of winter. The year ends with the Day of Dread on the 28th, when magic fails worldwide and dark forces stir.

weekdays.name: Lunadain
weekdays.description: First day of the week, associated with the moon and new beginnings

weekdays.name: Gromdain
weekdays.description: Second day of the week, a common day for labor and commerce

weekdays.name: Tserdain
weekdays.description: Third day of the week, often devoted to trade and markets

weekdays.name: Moldain
weekdays.description: Fourth day of the week, the middle day often used for important business

weekdays.name: Nytdain
weekdays.description: Fifth day of the week, associated with evening activities and gatherings

weekdays.name: Loshdain
weekdays.description: Sixth day of the week, often devoted to learning and preparation

weekdays.name: Soladain
weekdays.description: Seventh day of the week, associated with the sun and traditionally a day of rest

seasons.name: Winter
seasons.description: The cold season tempered by ocean breezes and mountain barriers that moderate Karameikos's climate.

seasons.name: Spring
seasons.description: The season of renewal, marked by the rainy season from early Vatermont to late Thaumont.

seasons.name: Summer
seasons.description: The warm season beginning on 1 Klarmont, with mild temperatures thanks to favorable geography.

seasons.name: Autumn
seasons.description: The harvest season beginning on 1 Ambyrmont, culminating in the Day of Dread on the final day of the year.
